properties.entry: SELECT AIRLINE, A.DEP_CODE, DEP_CITY, A.ARRIVAL_CODE, ARRIVAL_CITY, DEP_TIME, ARRIVAL_TIME, WHOLE_TIME, PRICE, NONSTOP_FLIGHT_YN, TRANSFER, WAITING_TIME, A.FLIGHT_NO FROM AIR_SCHEDULE A JOIN DEPARTURE D ON(A.DEP_CODE = D.DEP_CODE) JOIN ARRIVAL R ON(A.ARRIVAL_CODE = R.ARRIVAL_CODE) WHERE DEP_CITY = ? AND ARRIVAL_CITY = ? AND DEP_DATE = ?

INSERT INTO AIR_SCHEDULE (REG_NO, FLIGHT_NO, AIRLINE, DEP_CODE, DEP_DATE, DEP_TIME, ARRIVAL_CODE, ARRIVAL_DATE, ARRIVAL_TIME, WHOLE_TIME, PRICE, NONSTOP_FLIGHT_YN, TRANSFER, WAITING_TIME) VALUES (SEQ_AIRNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT FLIGHT_NO, DEP_CODE, ARRIVAL_CODE, DEP_DATE, DEP_TIME, ARRIVAL_DATE, ARRIVAL_TIME, PRICE FROM AIR_SCHEDULE WHERE FLIGHT_NO = ? AND DEP_DATE = ?
UPDATE AIR_SCHEDULE SET DEP_DATE = ?, DEP_TIME = ?, ARRIVAL_DATE = ?, ARRIVAL_TIME = ?, PRICE = ? WHERE FLIGHT_NO = ?
DELETE FROM AIR_SCHEDULE WHERE FLIGHT_NO = ? AND DEP_DATE = ?
